class.name: IsoLabel
class.documentation: The action routine PCONT will plot labels on contour lines either by default or as directed by the user. Contour labels may be plotted with different attributes from the contour line, e.g. colour and thickness. Contour labels are, by default, plotted on every 2nd contour line, but this may be changed by the user, if desired.
